description: Monitor network data for uncommon data flows that may be related to abuse of [Valid Accounts](https://attack.mitre.org/techniques/T1078) to log into a service specifically designed to accept remote connections, such as RDP, telnet, SSH, and VNC. Note: Network Analysis frameworks such as Zeek can be used to capture, decode, and alert on network service protocols such as SSH and RDP. #Protocol 6 = TCP #Protocol 17 = UDP Analytic 1 - Suspicious Protocols source="*Zeek:*" AND (port="636" AND protocol="6") OR (port="389" AND protocol="17")
